# Bug Report

## Summary

Describe the issue clearly and concisely.

## Affected Artifact

Path(s) involved (for example `control/control_plane.v1.json`, `protocol/transport.h`, `README.md`).

## Expected Behavior

What should happen according to the current contract/docs.

## Actual Behavior

What is happening now.

## Reproduction

Steps or inputs to reproduce.

## Impact

Who is affected (core/cli/ui/other consumers) and severity.
